Expertise

ICS offers a full range of services for implementing and supporting enterprise Dynamics AX / D365FO solutions. However, you can also order any of our services separately. Regardless of the type of services ordered, you will enjoy high team performance and the exceptional quality of our work.

D365 Finance & Operations D365 Customer Engagement MS Power Platform MS Azure
  • All services
  • Warehouse Package
  • SC Execution Package
  • Monitoring tool
  • Inventory Optimization Package
  • Demand Forecasting Package

ERP Scoping

Warehouse Package
D365 Finance & Operations, MS Azure

The Enapps Scoping Phase is designed to clearly define the deliverables of the ERP solution, outlining all current processes and specifying the required functionality in a comprehensive document. This ensures a clear understanding of the scope, costs, and work involved.

For smaller or less complex projects, scoping can be straightforward. For more complex projects with significant customisation needs, this phase will involve a deeper, more detailed approach, tailored to the organisation’s requirements.

ERP Implementation

Warehouse Package
MS Power Platform

The Enapps Scoping Phase is designed to clearly define the deliverables of the ERP solution, outlining all current processes and specifying the required functionality in a comprehensive document. This ensures a clear understanding of the scope, costs, and work involved.

For smaller or less complex projects, scoping can be straightforward. For more complex projects with significant customisation needs, this phase will involve a deeper, more detailed approach, tailored to the organisation’s requirements.
